types_of_data_collected: Account Information (name, contact information, credentials, date of birth, payment information, transaction history)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (when creating an account)
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain services, to improve and develop services, to communicate with you, to prevent fraud, illegal activity, or misuses, to protect the security of systems and services, to comply with legal obligations and to protect the rights, privacy, safety, or property of users, OpenAI, or third parties
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and Service Providers (for hosting, customer service, cloud services, payment processing, etc.), Business Transfers (to counterparties/successors during a Transaction), Government Authorities or Other Third Parties (for legal compliance, fraud prevention, safety/security, etc.), Affiliates, Business Account Administrators (if joined to a business account)
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations)

types_of_data_collected: User Content (prompts, uploaded files, images, audio)
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain services, to improve and develop services and conduct research (e.g., to train models), to communicate with you, to prevent fraud, illegal activity, or misuses, to protect the security of systems and services, to comply with legal obligations and to protect the rights, privacy, safety, or property of users, OpenAI, or third parties
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and Service Providers, Business Transfers, Government Authorities or Other Third Parties, Affiliates, Business Account Administrators (can access content), Other Users and Third Parties You Interact or Share Information With (e.g., shared links, custom actions)
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations). Note: ChatGPT temporary chats are kept up to 30 days for safety purposes.

retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations)

data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain services, to improve and develop services, to communicate with you, to prevent fraud, illegal activity, or misuses, to protect the security of systems and services, to comply with legal obligations and to protect the rights, privacy, safety, or property of users, OpenAI, or third parties

data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain services, to improve and develop services, to communicate with you, to prevent fraud, illegal activity, or misuses, to protect the security of systems and services, to comply with legal obligations and to protect the rights, privacy, safety, or property of users, OpenAI, or third parties

retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations)

types_of_data_collected: Location Information (general area from IP address, precise location from GPS if chosen)
methods_of_collection: Automatically determined (general area from IP address) or directly provided (precise location from device's GPS if chosen)
data_usage: Security reasons (e.g., detecting unusual login activity), to make product experience better (e.g., providing more accurate responses)
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and Service Providers, Business Transfers, Government Authorities or Other Third Parties, Affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations)

types_of_data_collected: Data stored via Cookies and Similar Technologies (may include information described in the policy, e.g., preferences)
methods_of_collection: Indirectly through cookies and similar technologies
data_usage: To operate and administer services, to improve your experience, to help maintain preferences across browsing sessions (if used without an account)
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and Service Providers, Business Transfers, Government Authorities or Other Third Parties, Affiliates
retention_period: Not specified (depends on the technology, but mentioned that it helps maintain preferences across browsing sessions)

types_of_data_collected: Information from Other Sources (from security partners, marketing vendors, publicly available internet data)
methods_of_collection: Indirectly from trusted partners and public internet sources
data_usage: To protect against fraud, abuse, and other security threats (from security partners), to provide information about potential customers of business services (from marketing vendors), to develop the models that power the Services (from publicly available internet data)
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and Service Providers, Business Transfers, Government Authorities or Other Third Parties, Affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide services, or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety/security, legal obligations)
